row.process:
! &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# ! VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY ! :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MY_DOMAIN#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,DOMAIN,1) :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,USER,1) :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,PASSWORD,1) :SET &MY_OU#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,OU_WSUS,1) :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host Move-ADObject -Identity "&GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" -TargetPath "&MY_OU#" write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $RC=$? if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" echo $RC } else { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" echo $RC } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL
! &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# ! VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY ! :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :SET &MY_DOMAIN#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,DOMAIN,1) :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,USER,1) :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,PASSWORD,1) :SET &MY_OU#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,OU,1) :SET &MY_ADTOOLS#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.ACTIVEDIRECTORY,AGENT,1)
:BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL $Username = "&MY_USER#" $Password = "&MY_PASSWORD#" $pass = ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText $Password -Force $cred = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $Username,$pass
write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" Invoke-Command -ComputerName &MY_ADTOOLS# {Add-Computer -computername &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# -DomainName &MY_DOMAIN# -OUPath "&MY_OU#" -Credential $args[0] } -credential $cred -Args $cred $RC=$? Write-Host "Return code: " $RC
if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" echo $RC } else { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" echo $RC } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: AD WSUS &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,AD WSUS &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="ECHEC AD WSUS &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: AD WSUS &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,AD WSUS &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
